micro_action.text: Today's practice: 5-minute box breathing (inhale 4s, hold 4s, exhale 4s, hold 4s) before demo prep to reduce nervous energy and stay present.
micro_action.aligned_with: The 5-minute breathing practice supports Inner Growth by cultivating emotional resilience, helping you stay calm and focused during demo day, aligning with the goal of inner confidence and self-mastery.

ideas: Demo day nerves = growth energy; reframe anxiety as excitement fueling your best work.
